DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct Europe . The aim study evaluate use insulin detemir ( Levemir® ) insufficiently control patient type 1 type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Use Levemir® Insufficiently Controlled Patients With Type 1 Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Patients insufficiently control type 1 type 2 diabetes mellitus previous therapy
